greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows, where the n-th row lists the (2n+1) coefficients of (1 + x + 3x^2)^n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows, flattened
mathematica: With[{eq = (1 + x + 3*x^2)}, Flatten[Table[CoefficientList[Expand[eq^n], x], {n, 0, 10}]]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 02 2017 *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jun 01 2003
